title: Import error
body:
Hi, first of all, thank you for such an amazing tool
I am installing deeplabcut on laptop for data annotation. I followed all the steps for installing it inside a conda environment on Ubuntu 18 and then when I tried to import it, I came across this error, I tried everything but couldn't make it go

import deeplabcut
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/abbas/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/__init__.py", line 33, in <module>
    from deeplabcut import generate_training_dataset
  File "/home/abbas/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/__init__.py", line 15, in <module>
    from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.auxfun_drag_label import *
  File "/home/abbas/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/auxfun_drag_label.py", line 18, in <module>
    import wx
  File "/home/abbas/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wx/__init__.py", line 17, in <module>
    from wx.core import *
  File "/home/abbas/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wx/core.py", line 12, in <module>
    from ._core import *
ImportError: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libharfbuzz.so.0: undefined symbol: FT_Get_Var_Blend_Coordinates

Any thoughts?
